remarks: Lemma for ~ mapdpg .  Baer p. 45, line 3:  "infer...the existence of a number g in G and of an element z in (Fy)* such that t = gx'-z."  (We scope $d ` g w z ph ` locally to avoid clashes with later substitutions into ` ph ` .)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2015.)
statement:

mapdpglem3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( J ` { G } ) ) $.
mapdpglem3 $p |- ( ph -> E. g e. B E. z e. ( M ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) t = ( ( g .x. G ) R z ) ) $.
